# data from CCLE project. transcriptomic (n=1019). 8.69 Tera bytes.
# https://www.ncbi.nlm.nih.gov/bioproject/PRJNA523380/

# datalist generated by below commmand
awk  -F"\t" 'FNR!=1 {print $1"\t"toupper($12)"\t"$3"\t"$25}' SraRunTable.tsv | sed 's/[\/ :;,.()-]//g' > datalist.txt

# download command generated by below command
cut -f1 datalist.txt | xargs -I{} echo prefetch -r yes {} > 0_download.sh
